title: Imam Hussain (AS) stood for truth, his message guides us today: Abdul Aleem Khan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 06 (APP):Federal Minister for Communications and President Istehkam-e-Pakistan Party (IPP), Abdul Aleem Khan, in his message on the occasion of Youm-e-Ashura, paid tribute to Hazrat Imam Hussain (AS), stating that his sacrifice at Karbala serves as a timeless example of standing for truth and justice.
The Minister said that Imam Hussain (AS), the beloved grandson of the Holy Prophet (PBUH), upheld the values of Islam through ultimate sacrifice, drawing a clear line between truth and falsehood. He said that following the path of Imam Hussain (AS) is the only way to achieve success in this life and the hereafter, said a press release issued here on Sunday.
He added that it is essential today to understand the philosophy of Imam Hussainâ€™s (AS) martyrdom in its true spirit. Muharram, he said, teaches us the lessons of patience and submission to the will of Allah Almighty. To follow the teachings of Imam Hussain (AS), it is imperative to practically adopt unity, tolerance, and patience values that are the foundation for a peaceful society, Abdul Aleem Khan concluded.
Meanwhile, President of Istehkam-e-Pakistan Party Punjab Rana Nazir Ahmad Khan, Central General Secretary Mian Khalid Mehmood, Central Information Secretary Syed Samsam Ali Bukhari and Punjab General Secretary & MPA Alhaj Muhammad Shoaib Siddiqui also issued a joint appeal for maintaining peace and harmony on Youm-e-Ashura.
They noted that 10th Muharram holds equal reverence and significance for the entire Muslim Ummah. On this sacred day we must commit to embrace the values of Imam Hussain (AS), promote unity and brotherhood and play our part in safeguarding the integrity and sovereignty of our beloved motherland.
